committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to include civilian security police of the Department of Defense within the civil service retirement provisions applicable to law enforcement officers and firefighters.

summary.text: Includes civilian security police of the Department of Defense within the civil service retirement provisions applicable to law enforcement officers and firefighters. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331)

titles.title: A bill to include civilian security police of the Department of Defense within the civil service retirement provisions applicable to law enforcement officers and firefighters.
